messages.content: What categories of clothing do you offer?

We have a stylish variety for you! 👗 Here are our categories:
- Shirts
- T-Shirts
- Sweaters
- Coats
- Jackets
- Pants
- Shorts
- Dresses

Let us know if you need further assistance! 😊
How can I change the phone number on my account?
To update your phone number, please email us at 📧 CSKH@ivy.com.vn. Keep in mind, you can update your number up to 3 times. 😊
I forgot my password. How can I reset it?

No worries, resetting your password is a breeze! 🔐
1. Log in to your account on the website.
2. Click your profile picture > "My Account".
3. Choose "Change Password" and follow the prompts.

If you need more help, feel free to ask! 😊
Why can't I log into my account?

Let's troubleshoot together! 🔍 Please check:
1. Internet connection stability.
2. Correct username and password entry.

If it still doesn't work, contact our support team for assistance! 📞
How do I place an order at IVY Moda?

Shopping with us is simple and fun! 🛍️
1. Browse our website/app for products.
2. Choose your item, select size and color, then "Add to Cart".
3. Review your cart and hit "Checkout".
4. Enter shipping details and select a payment method.
5. Confirm your order to receive a confirmation notification.

Enjoy your shopping! 😊
What are the steps to cancel an order?

Need to cancel? Follow these steps 🛑:
- Log into "Order Management".
- Select the order you wish to cancel.
- Click "Cancel Order".

Reach our hotline at 02466623434 if needed! 📞
How do I change my delivery address after placing an order?

Here's how you can update your address 🚚:
- For orders via Website/App without an account: Call us at 02466623434 or email 📧 CSKH@ivy.com.vn.
- With a registered account: Log in and update your address in "Order Management".

We’re here to help! 😊
How can I track my order status?
Tracking your order is easy! 🕵️‍♂️ Just go to "Order Management" in your account for real-time updates. Need more help? Let us know! 😊
What is your return policy?

Our Returns Policy 📦 is customer-friendly:
1. Return within 15 days at any IVY Moda store.
2. Ensure items are unused, with original tags and invoice.
3. Excluded items: Under 50% discounts, more specific exceptions apply.

Contact us for more details! 😊
Do you have a warranty on products?
Absolutely, we offer a lifetime free warranty for simple repairs! 🛠️ Please note, some exclusions apply like items labeled IVY Secret. Visit any showroom for repairs. 😊
How should I care for my IVY Moda clothes?

Keep your fashion fresh! 👗 Here are some tips:
- Knitwear: Dry flat.
- Chiffon & Silk: Hand wash.
- Coarse Fabrics: Machine wash if no decorations.

Always ensure proper care for long-lasting wear. 😊
What's your privacy policy?

Your privacy is important to us 🔐! We store and secure your information in accordance with international standards. Rest assured, no third party will track your data. For more details, check our Privacy Policy!
How is payment processed at IVY Moda?

We offer two secure payment methods 💳:
1. Cash on Delivery.
2. Online payment via OnePay using cards.

Choose your preferred method during checkout!
Can I exchange items?

Yes, exchanges are possible! 🔄
- Within 15 days for items discounted up to 50%.
- Items should be unused with tags and invoice.

Read the full policy for exclusions or ask us for help! 😊
How long does a refund take?
Refunds are processed in 10-15 days 🕒, depending on your bank. You'll receive a notification once processed. We’re here if you need any assistance!
What are your shipping policies?

Our Shipping Policy ensures you receive your order swiftly 📦:
- Free shipping for orders over 1 million VND.
- Delivery takes up to 7 days, based on location.

For more queries, just ask! 😊
What if I receive a defective product?
Oh no! 😟 If it happens, please document the unboxing with a video and email us at 📧 cskhonline@ivy.com.vn. We will assist with resolving the issue promptly!
Where can I get my product repaired?
Visit any IVY Moda showroom for repairs! 🛠️ Some exclusions exist, like for complex modifications. Feel free to contact our support for guidance. 😊
What if my order arrives later than expected?

We prioritize your security with robust measures 🛡️:
- Data encryption.
- Secure storage standards.

We continuously update to maintain security. Check our Privacy Policy for more insights! 😊
What are your payment options?

We've got flexible payment methods for you! 💳✨ Choose from:
1. Cash on Delivery (COD)
2. Online Payment through OnePay

Select your preference at checkout and enjoy shopping! 😊
How can I update my email address on my account?
Easy peasy! 📧✨ Just email us at CSKH@ivy.com.vn with your new email details, and we'll update it for you!
Can I change my order details after placing it?

🚚💨 Order updates are possible before shipping.
- Log in to your account, go to "Order Management", and edit details.

If shipped, contact our hotline for assistance!
Do you offer a warranty on shoes and accessories?
For shoes and accessories, warranties apply only to genuine leather items for 6 months! 👞👛 Visit showrooms for warranty services, excluding complex repairs.
How do I maintain my denim items?

Denim care made simple 👖✨:
- Avoid machine washing to preserve color.
- Hand washing recommended.
- Turn inside out before washing.

Keep your denim looking fresh! 😊
How should I store my clothes to maintain their quality?

Keep those garments fabulous! 👗✨ Try these tips:
- Use thick, rounded hangers.
- Rotate usage to avoid shape loss.

If you need more guidance, just ask! 😊
What should I do if I discover an item is missing from my order?
Oh no, let’s sort this out! 📦🚫 Immediately email us at cskhonline@ivy.com.vn with your order details and unboxing video. We'll assist right away!
How do I ensure the longevity of my fabric colors?

Keep your colors vivid with these tips! 🌈✨
- Wash separately and promptly.
- Use mild detergents.
- Dry in the shade.

Any more questions? I'm here to help! 😊
What are the safe zones for your shipping services?
We deliver across most territories 🇻🇳✨ via EMS. Note, special zones like islands may have additional considerations. Contact us for specific details!
Is there a limit to the number of changes I can make to my account info?
For phone updates, you can make up to 3 changes. For other info, contact our support for guidance! 😊🔄
How do I protect my login credentials?

Keep your account safe! 🔒✨
- Use strong, unique passwords.
- Avoid sharing details on non-IVY platforms.

Need more security tips? Reach out! 😊
Does IVY Moda support purchases with international cards?
Yes, indeed! 💳✨ We accept international cards through OnePay. Enjoy global shopping with us! 🌍
Can I exchange a sale item?
Exchanges are for sale items discounted at 50% or less, within 15 days of purchase! 📦✨ Ensure the item is in its original condition with tags.
How do I track delivery progress if I don't have an account?
For non-account orders, you can track via our delivery hotline ☎️ 0246 662 3434. Alternatively, email us for support.
What happens to my account info if I close my account?
We securely retain customer information for legal and fraud prevention reasons. 🔐 Rest assured, your data is protected!
How is online security maintained during payment?
Security comes first! ⚡️ Our payments are safeguarded by OnePay's stringent international standards. Feel confident while you shop! 🛒
What are the hours for customer service support?

We're here to help! 📞✨ Reach us:
- Monday to Friday, 8 AM - 5:30 PM.

For immediate contact, dial our hotline for assistance!
Is there a fee for extending the warranty service?
Our warranty is free for simple repairs! 🛠️✨ Extensions or additional services outside the standard scope may incur charges based on materials.
How do you handle privacy breaches?
We adhere to strict privacy protocols 🔐. For breaches, immediate investigation and alignment with relevant authorities ensure resolution. Your privacy is our priority!
Can I rearrange my delivery for a preferred date?
While specific scheduling isn't available, contact our support at ☎️ 0246 662 3434 to explore any flexible delivery options. We're happy to assist!
Do you offer free shipping?
Absolutely! 🎉 IVY Moda offers free shipping on orders over 1 million VND. 🚚✨ If you have any other questions or need further assistance, just let us know! 💬😊
How can I change or update the phone number linked to my IVY Moda account?
No worries! To update your phone number, simply send an email to 📧 CSKH@ivy.com.vn requesting the change. Just a heads-up, you can update your phone number up to 3 times for each account. 📱✨
How can I maintain the shape of my clothing?

To keep your clothes looking fabulous, here are some tips to maintain their shape: 
1. 🔄 Rotate Your Wardrobe: Mix it up by wearing clothes alternately, giving them a chance to breathe. After each wear, hang them in a well-ventilated space to keep them fresh. 🌬️
2. 👜 Keep It Light: Only carry the essentials in your pockets to avoid any garment distortion. ✨
3. 🧼 Stay Clean: Gently use a soft brush or lint roller to remove any debris before washing—your clothes will thank you! 🙌
4. 👔 Suits Deserve the Best: Never throw your suits in the washer. For the best results, take them to a pro cleaner to keep them in pristine condition. 🧑‍🔬

Got more questions? Don't hesitate to ask! 😊💬
Could you list your policies for me?

Of course! 📜 Here are our policies for your reference:
- Payments Policy
- Returns Policy
- Warranty Policy
- Shipping Policy
- Privacy Policy

Let us know if you need more details on any of these! 😊
How do I prevent my clothes from losing shape?

Great question! Here are a few tips to maintain shape: 👚✨
1. Rotate usage frequently.
2. Avoid overstuffing pockets.
3. Hang clothes on sturdy hangers.

Keep your wardrobe looking fresh! 😊
Can I request a specific delivery partner?
We use EMS for all deliveries 🚚 to ensure reliability. If you have specific needs, please contact our support for assistance!
What should I do if I receive an incorrect item?
We're sorry about that mix-up! 📦🔄 Please contact us at CSKH@ivy.com.vn with your order details and pictures. We'll resolve it quickly!
Is there a way to expedite my delivery?
Currently, standard shipping is within 7 days 🚀. Contact us at 0246 662 3434 for any faster delivery options. We’ll do our best to help!
How can I ensure my order is secure during shipping?

Your order's security is our top priority! 🔒✨ Ensure the package is intact upon arrival, and in case of any issues, record the unboxing and contact us immediately at cskhonline@ivy.com.vn. We're here to help!
